name: Heart Transfer
description:
A patient is in immediate need of a heart transplant. You are on your way to deliver the organ, but the city is stuck in a traffic jam! The destination hospital is only a few blocks away. It's a matter of life and death, keep the heart and the patient alive. Can you make it?

Controls:
- Arrow keys to move
- Space to jump

Requirements:
The game uses HTML5, WebGL, and WebAssembly, so it requires a browser that supports them. Loading the game for the first time can take a while, please be patient! If the game doesn't start or you can't move the character with the above controls, try left-clicking on the game area first. Also check that the browser is up-to-date.

Supported browsers:
- Firefox and Chrome work (tested)
- Edge and Internet explorer do not work (tested)
- Mobile browsers probably don't work and the controls are not supported anyway
